page.title: 11LONGBOROUGH SCHOOL 2
page.content: The children experience a modern curriculum & the school is well equipped with audio-visual aids including two B.B.C. micros & a video cassette recorder.Many activities are shared with other local schools particularly Swell & Blockley.Swimming lessons are held weekly at Chipping Campden Comprehensive which is the secondary school to which most of the children will eventually transfer. Longborough School has a supportive School Association which exists to arrange fund raising & social events.During 1985 a musical evening, a fayre,a raffle & a brass band evening raised over Â£600 for school funds.Two disc drives, a computer & a paperback library were purchased.A sponsored assault course in July raised Â£255 for the purchase of science apparatus.
